definition: to move/to shift/to change (a position or location etc)/to promote
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

sentences.english: Official efforts to lure manufacturers away from the coast have had mixed results.
sentences.chinese: 政府努力吸引製造企業遷離沿海地區，結果喜憂參半。

sentences.english: The failure of the harvest again produced famine and unpeopled farms and hamlets.
sentences.chinese: 歉收又造成了饑荒並迫使人民遷離農場和農村。
